item.title: How to make money with Crypto via ITOs and tokens (Part 2) - Draft
item.description: It is possible to make money on Cryptocurrencies, in an interesting but short window post ITO (Intial Token Offering). In this second of three installments we get to it! In part 1 we set the scene, and I left you with this teaser - the key to this is liquidity, or rather the lack of liquidity. It’s also about information, and we’ll get to that too. Let’s pick up it there.

item.title: How to make money with Crypto via ITOs and tokens (Part 1)
item.description: It is possible to make money on Cryptocurrencies, in an interesting but short window post ITO (Intial Token Offering). Trust me there’s more here than a clickbait title, but first we need to introduce our subject. When people think of Cryptocurrencies, if they know what they are, they think of Bitcoin first, and maybe the altcoins, of which there are many, such as Litecoin and Ethereum, to name just two.
